author: Special Correspondent
text:
There will be no water supply for two days on February 26 and 27 in the following areas: Vedaranyam municipal town and Vedaranyam panchayat union areas and Thalai Gnayiru town panchayat.

Maintenance

In a release here on Wednesday, S. Palanisamy, District Collector, said that the suspension in water supply was in the wake of the maintenance of the pipelines of the Vedaranyam Combined Drinking Water Supply scheme. The supply would resume on February 28.

KARAIKAL: As many as 2,170 senior citizens belonging to economically weaker section have been sanctioned Old Age Pension (OAP). M. Chandracasu, Minister for Agriculture, gave away the orders to the beneficiaries of Nendugadu Assembly Constituency at a function held here on Wednesday.
title: Water shutdown for two days in Vedaranyam
